Articles.Content:
The SR-71 with new parts and aero on an accidental:wink: maiden circumnavigation.


[imgur]JXa44[/imgur]

KerbalX link [URL]http://kerbalx.com/JTpopcorn/Sr-71[/URL]

Hope you enjoy,-JT Edited November 16, 2015 by JTpopcorn
Sleek looking aircraft man, like it! What kind of Ap can it reach?

[quote name='Majorjim']What kind of Ap can it reach?[/QUOTE]

25.5km was the max height on the circumnavigation, I still need to see how high it will go if I try, but I suspect it would make 70km. It could SSTO if I put in some oxidizer and threw on a rocket/rapier

-JT

[quote name='JTpopcorn']25.5km was the max height on the circumnavigation, I still need to see how high it will go if I try, but I suspect it would make 70km. It could SSTO if I put in some oxidizer and threw on a rocket/rapier

-JT[/QUOTE]

Cool man, that would be awesome. I can see how fast she is, it might not take much to nudge her into orbit.

[quote name='RRFroste']Download please[/QUOTE]
Will do when I get home.

[quote name='JTpopcorn']Will do when I get home.[/QUOTE]
Thx very much.
PS +1 rep
